channel.title: Please help me out with puttin my server online IM A HUGE NOOB!
channel.description:
well i spent forever making my own server, i have an account on no-ip.com, but ONLY I CAN ACCESS MY SERVER FROM 127.0.0.1!! i dont know how to let others on my server and i dont want to use hamachi because i dont want to put my computer at risk, and noone will play on it..
please please PLEASE help me, and use simple terms because im only 14, and i dont know that much... plz help :( :(

a router is a thing that routs the internet to several computers in a home network, if you get ur internet via wireless net work or LAN, not using a direct connection from a modem then u have a router
